text: @realDonaldTrump You’re re doing about as good on the COVID-19 “War”as you did on the Russian Cyber War...you let the Russians in by turning a blind 👁 to their cyber attacks on America because it benefitted you. You wanted to let COVID-19 “wash over” America until it took down the Stock Markets.
